DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study will evaluate predictors of response to Invirase (saquinavir) treatment in treatment-naïve patients with HIV infection. Data will be collected during 48 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on Predictors of Response to Invirase (Saquinavir) Treatment in Treatment-naïve Patients With HIV Infection
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age HIV infection Treatmentnaïve Initiation of treatment with Invirase Contraindications according to Invirase Summary of Product Characteristics
